title: Sharp plug
description: When your spacebar item is not fully charged, you can press spacebar to recharge it at the cost half of a heart per charge
Can be used on partially charged items
Will not kill you if used - it stops a half a heart left
Red hearts are taken before other kinds
The Sharp Plug will take health from Soul/Black hearts (if any) before taking red hearts
REPENTANCE - This item has been reworked, see above. No longer ruins your devil/angel chance if used on red hearts
